short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Anti-Vaxxer Vaccine is the first digital vaccine designed to fight the spread of anti-vaxxerism online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anti-vaxxerism has been around for almost as long as vaccines. But it’s never been as virulent and dangerous as it is today, leading to declining vaccination rates, disease outbreaks and death. The Anti-Vaxxer Vaccine is the first digital vaccine designed to fight the spread of anti-vaxxerism online. Once your browser is inoculated, it will be able to detect and remove any content containing misinformation related to vaccines. So that when it comes your family’s health, you can always make an informed decision.
